robot

Class Robot

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.shape.Shape
        • javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle
          • robot.Entity
            • robot.Robot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent>, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class Robot
extends Entity
implements javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent>
    Description: Class that represents the robot - its movement and perspective. Overrides some JavaFX rectangle methods
    Author:
    Geraint and Lucas

    • Constructor Detail

      • Robot

        public Robot(java.lang.String name,
             double xCoordinate,
             double yCoordinate,
             double speed,
             double maxSpeed,
             double acceleration,
             double angularVelocity,
             double odometer,
             double batteryLeft,
             double batteryCapacity,
             double axleLength,
             double wheelRadius)
        Description: Verbose robot class constructor
        Parameters:
        name: - The robot's ID.
        xCoordinate: - The robot's initial x position.
        yCoordinate: - The robot's initial y position.
        speed: - The robot's initial speed.
        maxSpeed: - The robot's max speed.
        acceleration: - The robot's acceleration.
        angularVelocity: - The robot's angular velocity.
        odometer: - The robot's initial distance travelled.
        batteryLeft: - The robot's initial battery level.
        batteryCapacity: - The robot's battery capacity.
        axleLength: - The robot's axle length.
        wheelRadius: - The robot's wheel radius.

        Description: Creates the robot's parameters from an XML file.
        Parameters:
        s: - The ID of the robot you want to load

        public void setSpeed(double speed)
        Description: Sets the robot's speed and limits it to be less than or equal the robot's maximum speed.
        Parameters:

        public void timeLap()
        Description: Time the current lap. Checks if new lap time is the new high score

      • handle

        public void handle(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
        Description: Event handler for robot key events. Adds strings to currentKeyPresses array to keep track of which buttons are being held down. Logs to src/logs file
        Specified by:
        handle in interface javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent>

      • move

        public void move(double[] wallEcomponents)
        Description: Moves the robot depending on keypresses. It calls the static methods in the movement class to translate and transform the robot, and calculate the relative velocities of the left and right wheels.
        Parameters:
        wallEcomponents: - orientation components derived from the robots orientation

      • moveViaFile

        public void moveViaFile(java.lang.String path)
